title: All These Approximate Ramsey Properties
abstract: We consider finitary approximations of the (embedding) Ramsey property. Using a class of homogeneous reducts of random ordered hypergraphs, we prove that these properties form a strict hierarchy. We also show that every class of finite structures in which every structure of size at most 2 is a "Ramsey object" essentially consists of ordered structures, generalising a known result for countable Ramsey classes.
comment: 15 pages. arXiv admin note: text overlap with arXiv:2212.08027
